description: The president demands proposals to rebuild trust between France's citizens and police.
title: Macron 'shame' at beating of black man by Paris police officers
title_page: Macron 'shame' at beating of black man by Paris police officers - BBC News
maintext: As he arrived at police headquarters on Thursday with his lawyer to file a complaint, Mr Zecler told reporters: "People who should have been protecting me attacked me. I did nothing to deserve this. I just want these three people to be punished according to the law."
